scripts.dev: npm run desktop:prepare-resources && sh -c 'tsx --watch src/server/index.ts & electron-forge start & vitest --watch --reporter=default --reporter=./scripts/vitest-notify-reporter.mjs'
scripts.desktop:make:mac: npm run test && npm run desktop:prepare-resources && electron-forge make --platform=darwin
scripts.desktop:make:win: npm run test && npm run desktop:prepare-resources && electron-forge make --platform=win32
scripts.desktop:make:linux: npm run test && npm run desktop:prepare-resources && electron-forge make --platform=linux
scripts.test: tsc --noEmit && biome check . && openapi validate docs/requirements/GOOSE_SERVER_OPENAPI.json && vitest run && knip && dpdm --exit-code circular:1 --warning false --tree false "./src/**/*.ts" && jscpd --pattern "src/**/*.ts" --min-tokens 100 --threshold 3 --reporters console --absolute
